::KitKat::

She ran untill she came to a mountain base, about 15 miles away rom 
the pred base.  She stopped and looked around.  She closed her eyes 
and saw Land Mine's face staring back at her in pain and anger.  She 
spoke out. "Leave me alone!"  She turned and ran up the hillside.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit saw her kept running. He followed, but kept back a ways, 
giving
> her some space.
